pullRequest.title: Added check on OpenId idToken on the AuthenticationServiceShiroImpl
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added check on OpenId idToken on the AuthenticationServiceShiroImpl to be sure that the token is not null.
Related Issue
This PR fixes/closes #3041
Description of the solution adopted
A check is added on the login method of the AuthenticationServiceShiroImpl class. It throws an exception if the getIdToken() method returns a null or an empty value.
